info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Gets information about the specified network interface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands referenced resources.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterface resource.

put.description: Creates or updates a network interface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update network interface operation.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterface resource.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterface resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update network interface tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterface resource.

get.description: Gets all network interfaces in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkInterface resources.

get.description: Gets all network interfaces in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkInterface resources.

post.description: Gets all route tables applied to a network interface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of EffectRoute resources.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: Gets all network security groups applied to a network interface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkSecurityGroup resources.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Get all ip configurations in a network interface

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkInterface IPConfiguration resources.

get.description: Gets the specified network interface ip configuration.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: ipConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the ip configuration name.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting NetworkInterface IPConfiguration resource.

get.description: List all load balancers in a network interface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkInterface LoadBalancer resources.

delete.description: Deletes the specified tap configuration from the NetworkInterface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: tapConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the tap configuration.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

get.description: Get the specified tap configuration on a network interface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: tapConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the tap configuration.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a tap configuration.

put.description: Creates or updates a Tap configuration in the specified NetworkInterface.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

parameters.name: tapConfigurationName
parameters.description: The name of the tap configuration.

parameters.name: tapConfigurationParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update tap configuration operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting Tap Configuration resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting Tap configuration resource.

get.description: Get all Tap configurations in a network interface

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the network interface.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of NetworkInterface TapConfiguration resources.

properties.description: Properties of the Virtual Network Tap configuration

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

NetworkInterfaceTapConfiguration.description: Tap configuration in a Network Interface

virtualNetworkTap.description: The reference of the Virtual Network Tap resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the network interface tap configuration. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

NetworkInterfaceTapConfigurationProperti.description: Properties of Virtual Network Tap configuration.

virtualNetworkTaps.description: The reference to Virtual Network Taps.

loadBalancerInboundNatRules.description: A list of references of LoadBalancerInboundNatRules.

privateIPAddress.description: Private IP address of the IP configuration.

privateIPAllocationMethod.description: Defines how a private IP address is assigned. Possible values are: 'Static' and 'Dynamic'.

privateIPAddressVersion.description: Available from Api-Version 2016-03-30 onwards, it represents whether the specific ipconfiguration is IPv4 or IPv6. Default is taken as IPv4.  Possible values are: 'IPv4' and 'IPv6'.

subnet.description: Subnet bound to the IP configuration.

primary.description: Gets whether this is a primary customer address on the network interface.

publicIPAddress.description: Public IP address bound to the IP configuration.

applicationSecurityGroups.description: Application security groups in which the IP configuration is included.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the network interface IP configuration. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

dnsServers.description: List of DNS servers IP addresses. Use 'AzureProvidedDNS' to switch to azure provided DNS resolution. 'AzureProvidedDNS' value cannot be combined with other IPs, it must be the only value in dnsServers collection.

appliedDnsServers.description: If the VM that uses this NIC is part of an Availability Set, then this list will have the union of all DNS servers from all NICs that are part of the Availability Set. This property is what is configured on each of those VMs.

internalDnsNameLabel.description: Relative DNS name for this NIC used for internal communications between VMs in the same virtual network.

internalFqdn.description: Fully qualified DNS name supporting internal communications between VMs in the same virtual network.

internalDomainNameSuffix.description: Even if internalDnsNameLabel is not specified, a DNS entry is created for the primary NIC of the VM. This DNS name can be constructed by concatenating the VM name with the value of internalDomainNameSuffix.

NetworkInterfaceDnsSettings.description: DNS settings of a network interface.

virtualMachine.description: The reference of a virtual machine.

networkSecurityGroup.description: The reference of the NetworkSecurityGroup resource.

interfaceEndpoint.description: A reference to the interface endpoint to which the network interface is linked.

ipConfigurations.description: A list of IPConfigurations of the network interface.

tapConfigurations.description: A list of TapConfigurations of the network interface.

dnsSettings.description: The DNS settings in network interface.

macAddress.description: The MAC address of the network interface.

primary.description: Gets whether this is a primary network interface on a virtual machine.

enableAcceleratedNetworking.description: If the network interface is accelerated networking enabled.

enableIPForwarding.description: Indicates whether IP forwarding is enabled on this network interface.

hostedWorkloads.description: A list of references to linked BareMetal resources

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the network interface resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the public IP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

NetworkInterface.description: A network interface in a resource group.

value.description: A list of network interfaces in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkInterfaceListResult.description: Response for the ListNetworkInterface API service call.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkInterfaceTapConfigurationListResu.description: Response for list tap configurations API service call.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkInterfaceIPConfigurationListResul.description: Response for list ip configurations API service call.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkInterfaceLoadBalancerListResult.description: Response for list ip configurations API service call.

networkSecurityGroup.description: The ID of network security group that is applied.

effectiveSecurityRules.description: A collection of effective security rules.

additionalProperties.description: List of IP Addresses within the tag (key)

tagMap.description: Mapping of tags to list of IP Addresses included within the tag.

subnet.description: The ID of the subnet if assigned.

networkInterface.description: The ID of the network interface if assigned.

EffectiveNetworkSecurityGroupAssociation.description: The effective network security group association.

name.description: The name of the security rule specified by the user (if created by the user).

protocol.description: The network protocol this rule applies to. Possible values are: 'Tcp', 'Udp', and 'All'.

sourcePortRanges.description: The source port ranges. Expected values include a single integer between 0 and 65535, a range using '-' as separator (e.g. 100-400), or an asterisk (*)

destinationPortRanges.description: The destination port ranges. Expected values include a single integer between 0 and 65535, a range using '-' as separator (e.g. 100-400), or an asterisk (*)

sourceAddressPrefixes.description: The source address prefixes. Expected values include CIDR IP ranges, Default Tags (VirtualNetwork, AzureLoadBalancer, Internet), System Tags, and the asterisk (*).

destinationAddressPrefixes.description: The destination address prefixes. Expected values include CIDR IP ranges, Default Tags (VirtualNetwork, AzureLoadBalancer, Internet), System Tags, and the asterisk (*).

access.description: Whether network traffic is allowed or denied. Possible values are: 'Allow' and 'Deny'.

direction.description: The direction of the rule. Possible values are: 'Inbound and Outbound'.

value.description: A list of effective network security groups.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

EffectiveNetworkSecurityGroupListResult.description: Response for list effective network security groups API service call.

name.description: The name of the user defined route. This is optional.

source.description: Who created the route. Possible values are: 'Unknown', 'User', 'VirtualNetworkGateway', and 'Default'.

state.description: The value of effective route. Possible values are: 'Active' and 'Invalid'.

addressPrefix.description: The address prefixes of the effective routes in CIDR notation.

nextHopIpAddress.description: The IP address of the next hop of the effective route.

nextHopType.description: The type of Azure hop the packet should be sent to. Possible values are: 'VirtualNetworkGateway', 'VnetLocal', 'Internet', 'VirtualAppliance', and 'None'.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

EffectiveRouteListResult.description: Response for list effective route API service call.

privateIPAddress.description: The private IP address of the IP configuration.

privateIPAllocationMethod.description: The private IP allocation method. Possible values are 'Static' and 'Dynamic'.

subnet.description: The reference of the subnet resource.

publicIPAddress.description: The reference of the public IP resource.

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the public IP resource. Possible values are: 'Updating', 'Deleting', and 'Failed'.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.
